ygData.subject: Re: About your post for EQ quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Guard Cheslasn Or something like that Patrols Just to the mouth of OF BB on his route ...  About every 45 minutes of so . H HE stops Drops a Card  (Library
ygData.messageBody:
Mushin wrote:

> I think that you have stumbled across a Library of Erudin Library
> card. I have one of the two pages and all it says is "page 34 of a
> book" Keep that card since I have never gotten one I am not sure what
> it is for but I have noticed several quest that have something to do
> with the Library of Erudin. So far the Eruds tonic quests, Quest to
> fix Shakey the Scarecrow, and Testament of Vanear quest all have
> vital information in the library. ThanksMushinEnchanter
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Louie/Zandrix/Zaphod2064 <louie@...>
> To: wizard-labbs@...
> <wizard-labbs@...>
> Date: Friday, May 21, 1999 1:39 PM
> Subject: About your post for EQ quests
> About this book... I believe I have found one of the
> pages, but I am not sure... when you get infomation about
> this item, it says "Library of Erudin". Usually I just
> destroy this item, but you have sparked my interest. I
> would like more information about this quest. Thank you ;
> ) By the way, I did not have to kill anything to get this
> page. A certain NPC drops it. Gibblin (main
> character)Halfling Druid
>

Guard Cheslasn Or something like that Patrols Just to the mouth of OF BB
on his route ... About every 45 minutes of so . H HE stops Drops a
Card (Library of Erudin Library card) walks away Then turns around say
DId I drop something the sometimes comes back and gets it sometimes not
then goes on his mary way .... /auc in Qeynos hills and you can get one
for 1-2 gold Its a lore item so you can only have 1 .. And there are
different card names but there all 1 card I've seen a king queen and a
Jack but there the same card different names I couldn't actually get
more than one card.



--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"But I've always been a Loner by Nature
and A Lurker by Want"

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
